thread.title: Plaza Hotel Astor Suite For Sale - Luxury Homes
thread.title_full: Plaza Hotel Astor Suite For Sale - Luxury Homes

author: harpersbazaar.com
title: Plaza Hotel Astor Suite For Sale - Luxury Homes
text:
Whenever a property hits the market at the iconic Plaza hotel , it's bound to catch the attention of quite a few high-profile homebuyers and investors—and of course, anyone whose dreams are made of beautiful real estate. But in the case of the Astor Suite, which just went up for sale for $39.5 million, there's an especially historic and venerable background that makes the listing awe-worthy. The 4,284-square-foot apartment has consistently been considered the best suite in The Plaza, and former residents include John Jacob Astor, the Duke and Duchess of Windsor and John F. Kennedy — the listing claims it is "one of the most historic homes ever to become available in the United States."
 Rich Caplan Currently, the 3-bedroom, 5.5-bathroom property is owned by Espirit founder and former CEO Jürgen Friedrich, who purchased it for $25 million in 2007, according to 6sqft .
